definition: a long plume, especially one of egret feathers, worn on a hat, or a piece of jewelry in the shape of a plume
details:
noun
- a long plume, especially one of egret feathers, worn on a hat, or a piece of jewelry in the shape of a plume
= example: a long plume, especially one of egret feathers, worn on a hat, or a piece of jewelry in the shape of a plume
= synonyms: aigrette
